title: ASUS TUF Gaming 27” 1440P HDR Monitor (VG27AQ3A) – QHD (2560 x 1440), 180Hz, 1ms, Fast IPS, 130% sRGB, Extreme Low Motion Blur Sync, Speakers, Freesync Premium, G-SYNC Compatible, HDMI, DisplayPort
description: The 27-inch TUF Gaming VG27AQ3A QHD gaming monitor featuring a IPS panel for blistering-fast 180 Hz gaming. ASUS Extreme Low Motion Blur Sync (ELMB Sync) and AMD FreeSync™ Premium, G-SYNC compatible, VESA AdaptiveSync technologies enables buttery-smooth gaming. In addition, it supports HDR and has a 130% sRGB gamut to offer exceptional colors and contrast.
